thread.title: Both new and old Apple TVs get CBS and NBC today
thread.title_full: Both new and old Apple TVs get CBS and NBC today

title: Both new and old Apple TVs get CBS and NBC today
text:
Published By: Joystiq.com - Xbox - Today 
Apple announced on Tuesday that two of the "Big Four" cable channels, CBS and NBC, are available on current (2nd) generation Apple TV boxes.... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
